ai-mil5.5.2:4.1_0: “Great king, the Buddha has spoken about this:
ai-mil5.5.2:4.2_0: ‘He should be heedless, not be heedless.’
ai-mil5.5.2:4.3_0: ‘I ate somewhere from the ascetics of another religion. I eat even more even more.’
ai-mil5.5.2:4.4_0: “Great king, when the Buddha says this:
ai-mil5.5.2:4.5_0: ‘He wouldn’t be heedless and start out their own doctrine!’ Then he said that the Realized One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha, has nothing to do with all these things.
ai-mil5.5.2:5.1_0: When you kill a living creature, you’ll kill living creatures, steal, commit adultery, lie, and take anyone else’s life. They use the murdererer, an unhappy, or a murderer, or a perfected one. They cause the Realized One, the perfected ones, and the fully awakened Buddha.
